description: This men’s Merino wool hoodie is designed with your comfort in mind. Instead of top-of-the-shoulder seams, it’s constructed with shoulder panels—wearing a backpack will feel like a breeze. Plus, the anti-chafing flatlock seams will mean you'll hardly notice the garment on your back. And, because they’re colored with our eco-conscoius plant-based dye, each hoodie looks different, for a one-of-a-kind result.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal (250) Plant-Based Dye Merino Base Layer Logo Hoodie - Mens
